blocks.data:
Returns a list of all *Tax Classes* in a store.

Default sorting is by tax-class id, from lowest to highest.

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Information & Settings | modify | `store_v2_information` |
|  Information & Settings | read-only | `store_v2_information_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication). 
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

page.description: Optional filter param. Number of pages.

limit.description: Optional filter param. Number of items per page

id.description: The unique numerical ID of the tax class. A read-only value which is automatically assigned and increments sequentially.

name.description: The name of the tax class.

created_at.description: Date and time of the tax class' creation. Read-Only.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the tax class was last updated. Read-Only.
